readable.title: 2628331789_c7f7d90e5d
readable.content: A little girl jumps into the arms of her mother , standing in a pool . a woman catches a young boy jumping into the pool . A young child is jumping into the arms of a woman wearing a black swimming suit while in a pool . The lady catches the toddler in the pool . While others watch , a young girl jumps into a pool as a woman reaches for her .
